tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
)

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE payment_history (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id UUID REFERENCES payment_transactions(transaction_id),
  settlement_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  settlement_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  settlement_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE payments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE settlements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    settlement_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE payment_transactions (transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
                        payer_account_id UUID,
                        payee_account_id UUID,
                        amount DECIMAL,
                        currency VARCHAR,
                        status VARCHAR)
